tvdb: Jack suspects Livvie was behind Tess's absence but Tess claims she saved her. Livvie learns Stephen gave Tess her doll. Tess asks Jack to give her a real baby. Rafe tells Ali to stay away from Stephen, then agrees to keep an open mind. Stephen tells Joshua that although he bit Elizabeth, he didn't mean to turn her into one of them, then claims she won't know what she is due to their liquid concoction. Joshua offers to get rid of Livve, but Stephen tells him not to touch her. Livvie looks for Caleb but runs into Joshua. Stephen visits Ali and explains Elizabeth was too tired to come, then Elizabeth shows up and kisses him.
